Abstract
Background: New approaches to delivering insecticides need to be developed to improve malaria vector...
Methods: Experimental hut trials were carried out in Valley du Kou, Burkina Faso to evaluate the eff...
Results: The overall kdr and ace-1 R allele frequencies were 0.95 and 0.01 respectively. Mortality w...
Conclusion: P-methyl DL and NWH outperformed pyrethroid DL. Combining p-methyl DL and NWH with LLINs...

Introduction
Malaria vector control largely depends on a limited collection of tools. Long lasting insecticidal n...
The covering of home walls with insecticidal materials is a novel approach that simulates IRS. Insec...
where recurrent IRS treatments are normally required for interruption of transmission. DL also has t...
In rural Africa, householders often cover their walls with wall hangings made from netting material ...
It is now clear that the development and rapid spread of insecticide resistance in An gambiae popula...
The aim of the current study was to investigate via a series of experimental hut trials whether DL o...

Experimental hut treatments
Three experimental hut trials were carried out. The first two trials lasted 6 weeks and the third la...
- 1. Untreated Control (untreated plastic sheeting)...
- 2. Pyrethroid treated durable lining (ZeroVector H , Vestergaard Frandsen, Switzerland) on walls...

- 2. Pyrethroid LLIN (Permanet H 2.0 Vestergaard Frandsen, Switzerland), with 6 holes...
- 5. P-methyl DL on walls and ceilings + Pyrethroid LLIN with 6 holes...
- 6. P-methyl NWH on walls and ceilings + Pyrethroid LLIN with 6 holes...

trials were preserved for molecular analysis. Only samples from the first and second experimental hu...

For genotyping data, differences in survival of resistant genotypes for each treatment was analysed ...
